suite.name: Suite-Ui

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to given URL.

kw.name: Set Window Size
kw.doc: Sets the `width` and `height` of the current window to the specified values.

kw.name: Register Keyword To Run On Failure
kw.doc: Sets the keyword to execute when a Selenium2Library keyword fails.
kw.msg: On Fail will be run on failure.

kw.name: Set Screenshot Directory
kw.doc: Sets the root output directory for captured screenshots.

kw.name: Get Email Address
kw.doc: Return full email address from login and domain from params in class

kw.name: Set Suite Variable
kw.doc: Makes a variable available everywhere within the scope of the current suite.

kw.doc: Waits until element specified with `locator` appears on current page.
